summary: vanessa santillan 's body was found in a # 400,000 flat in fulham , south west london , at the end of march . the 33-year-old mexican national , who worked as a transgender escort , died at the end of march . her body was found in a flat in fulham having been strangled and beaten to death . a 23-year-old man was arrested in connection with her death but has been bailed .

aspect: 1. A man has been arrested in connection with the death of a transgender escort found strangled and beaten last month in Fulham, London.
2. Vanessa Santillan's body was found in a £400,000 flat in Fulham at the end of March.
3. She was killed as a result of injuries to the head and neck.
4. A 23-year-old man was arrested but has been bailed and told to return for further questioning.
5. Police are appealing to anyone who may have had contact with Miss Santillan in the hours before her death.
6. Miss Santillan worked as a transgender escort in London, Paris, and Miami.
7. Police did not confirm whether her profession was central to the investigation but said they would do everything to solve the case.
8. London Ambulance Service was called to a flat in Romily Court, Fulham, on March 28 at around 9.30pm.
9. Miss Santillan was pronounced dead at the scene having suffered injuries to her head and neck.
10. Miss Santillan is understood to have moved to London from Mexico.
explain: One core idea of given aspect is that a man has been arrested in connection with the death of a transgender escort found strangled and beaten last month in Fulham, London.

This aspect states that Vanessa Santillan's body was found in a £400,000 flat in Fulham at the end of March. It provides more information about the location and time of her death. The fact that she was found in a luxurious flat with an estimated value of £400,000 adds a new dimension to the case and could be significant in the investigation.
According to the aspect, Vanessa Santillan was killed as a result of injuries to the head and neck, which suggests that she may have been strangled or had her neck broken during the assault.

The aspect notes that a 23-year-old man was arrested in connection with Vanessa Santillan's death, but has been bailed and instructed to return for further questioning. This means that although the man was initially detained, he was later released and required to come back for additional interrogation.

The police are appealing to anyone who may have had contact with Vanessa Santillan in the hours before her death as they believe that these individuals could have crucial information about her murder. This could include information about her whereabouts, any suspicious individuals she may have encountered, or any unusual behavior she may have exhibited. Ultimately, the police hope that this information will help them to identify and apprehend the individual or individuals responsible for her death.
Miss Santillan was a successful transgender escort who worked in various cities around the world, including London, Paris, and Miami.

The aspect states that the police are committed to solve the case, but they didn't confirm whether Vanessa Santillan's profession as a transgender escort played a role in her murder. It implies that the police are taking the case seriously and will investigate it thoroughly, regardless of her profession.

The core idea of this aspect is that London Ambulance Service was called to Romily Court, Fulham on March 28, 2021 at around 9.30pm. It is an important piece of information that provides a time frame of the incident related to Vanessa Santillan's death. It could be used to construct a timeline of events or to track the response time of the emergency services.
The aspect states that the cause of Vanessa Santillan's death was strangulation and blunt force trauma to the head and neck.

This aspect of the story provides more information about the victim, Vanessa Santillan, specifically her nationality and her occupation. It states that she was a Mexican national who worked as a transgender escort.
